abilities.name: Burning Ground
about: Encounter leaves burning ground behind them

abilities.name: Firestorm
about: Rains numerous fiery bolts in an area

abilities.name: Teleport
about: Teleports encounter to random location in an area

abilities.name: Molten Shell
about: Applies a buff that adds to encounter's armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around encounter based on the total damage that was taken from the buff.
